name: relwdom

stmt.origin: relopabi(hs0, hs1, cwdom, wo(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wex(hs2, wfo(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))))

body.origin:
|- wrel(cwdom)
-| wceq(cwdom, copab(hs0, hs1, wo(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wex(hs2, wfo(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wrel(cwdom)
-| wceq(cwdom, copab(hs0, hs1, wo(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wex(hs2, wfo(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cwdom, copab(hs0, hs1, wo(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wex(hs2, wfo(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))))
-| diffss(hs0, hs1)
-| diffss(hs0, hs2)
-| diffss(hs1, hs2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wrel(cwdom)
-| diffss(hs0, hs1)
-| diffss(hs0, hs2)
-| diffss(hs1, hs2)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ Rel(≼*)
⊣ d(hs0, hs1)
⊣ d(hs0, hs2)
⊣ d(hs1, hs2)

comment: Weak dominance is a relation. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 11-Feb-2015.)
